devdoc.author: develop@teller.finance.
devdoc.details: It is used by the LoanManager contract to delegatecall from.

_updateImplementationStored().details: It uses the LogicVersionsRegistry contract to get the logic address or the cached address if valid.It caches the current logic address for the proxy to reduce gas on subsequent calls within the same block.

params.loanID: The loan ID to check the collateral ratio for.

returns._0: bool indicating whether the loan with specified parameters can be deposited to an EOA.

params.loanID: The loan ID for which to get collateral information for

returns._0: uint256 Collateral needed in lending token value

getCollateralNeededInTokens(uint256).details: If the loan status is TermsSet, then the value is whats needed to take out the loan.If the loan status is Active, then the value is the threshold at which the loan can be liquidated at.

params.loanID: The loan ID to get needed collateral info for.

returns.escrowLoanValue: uint256 The value of the loan held in the escrow contract.
returns.neededInLendingTokens: int256 The minimum collateral value threshold required.

params.loanID: The loan ID to get collateral info for.

returns.escrowLoanValue: uint256 The value of the loan held in the escrow contract
returns.neededInCollateralTokens: int256 Collateral needed in Collateral tokens (wei)
returns.neededInLendingTokens: int256 Collateral needed in Lending tokens.

params.amountBorrow: The principal of the loan to take out.
params.loanID: The loan ID to get the owed interest.

getInterestRatio(uint256).details: The interest rate on the loan terms is APY.

params.loanID: The loan ID to get the interest rate for.
The loan ID to get the info.

returns._0: The value the liquidator will receive denoted in collateral tokens.

params.loanID: The loan ID to get the total amount owed.
The loan ID to get the total amount owed.
The loan ID for which to check the status

returns._0: bool value indicating if the loan is active or has terms set
true if the loan is liquidable.
bool value of it being secured or not.

LOAN_DATA_LOGIC_NAME().notice: Holds the logic name used for the LoanData contract.

LOAN_TERMS_CONSENSUS_LOGIC_NAME().notice: Holds the logic name used for the LoanTermsConsensus contract.

_updateImplementationStored().notice: Updates the current implementation logic address for the stored logic name.

assetSettings().notice: It holds the platform AssetSettings instance.

cToken().notice: Holds the Compound cToken where the underlying token matches the lending token.

canGoToEOA(uint256).notice: Checks whether a loan is allowed to be deposited to an Externally Owned Account.

getCollateralInLendingTokens(uint256).notice: Returns the collateral needed for a loan, in the lending token, needed to take out the loan or for it be liquidated.

getCollateralNeededInTokens(uint256).notice: Returns the minimum collateral value threshold, in the lending token, needed to take out the loan or for it be liquidated.

getCollateralNeededInfo(uint256).notice: Get information on the collateral needed for the loan.

getInterestOwedFor(uint256,uint256).notice: Returns the amount of interest owed for a given loan and loan amount.

getInterestRatio(uint256).notice: Returns the interest ratio based on the loan interest rate for the loan duration.

getLiquidationReward(uint256).notice: It gets the current liquidation reward for a given loan.

getLoanAmount(uint256).notice: Returns the total amount owed for a specified loan.

getTotalOwed(uint256).notice: Returns the total amount owed for a specified loan.

implementationStored().notice: It stores the last known logic address locally to reduce gas costs.

isActiveOrSet(uint256).notice: Checks whether the status of a loan is Active or has Terms Set

isLiquidable(uint256).notice: It checks if a loan can be liquidated.

isLoanSecured(uint256).notice: Checks whether the loan's collateral ratio is considered to be secured based on the settings collateral buffer value.

lendingPool().notice: Holds the instance of the LendingPool used by the LoanManager.

lendingToken().notice: Holds the lending token used for creating loans by the LoanManager and LendingPool.

loanIDCounter().notice: Holds the ID of loans taken out

loans(uint256).notice: Holds the data of all loans for the lending token.

logicName().notice: It represent the logic name (key) used for this proxy.

logicRegistry().notice: It returns the logic registry that is used to determine the implementation logic for this proxy.

settings().notice: It holds the platform Settings instance.

strictDynamic().notice: Boolean indicating if the proxy must check the registry for a new implementation.

totalCollateral().notice: Holds the total amount of collateral held by the contract.

upgradeProxyTo(address).notice: It updates a proxy's cached implementation address.It must only be called by the LogicVersionsRegistry for non strict DynamicProxy

userdoc.notice: This contract stores the logic for calculating loan information.
